attributes.action: abolish these ridiculouse compensation payouts which the european courts seem to delight in handing out
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: in fact lets get away from the european courts altogether,why should we accept their rulings,when we have laws of our own.We are a laughing stock of the world.Criminals laugh at us and terrorists laugh at us because they know full well that they can get away with murder.
